Package farmsAndFarmer

Class Farm

java.lang.Object
farmsAndFarmer.Farm
Direct Known Subclasses:
FarmBasic, FarmGoodAnimal, FarmGoodSoil, FarmRich
public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the farm

  • Constructor Details

    • Farm

      public Farm​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String kind, Farmer owner, double cash)
      Constructor using parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - The desired name for the farm.
      kind - The type of farm to be made.
      owner - The Farmer created by the player.
      cash - The initial available money.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the farm.
      Returns:
      name A String of the farm's name.

    • getFarmer

      public Farmer getFarmer()
      Gets the farm's farmer object.
      Returns:
      farmer The farm's Farmer object.

    • getType

      public java.lang.String getType()
      Gets the farm's type.
      Returns:
      type The farm's type.

    • getMoney

      public double getMoney()
      Gets the current money available to the user.
      Returns:
      money The farm's current money.

    • getProfit

      public double getProfit()
      Returns the difference in current money and the money the player had at the start of the game.
      Returns:
      profit The total profit since the start of the game.

    • getAnimals

      public java.util.ArrayList<Animal> getAnimals()
      Gets the current animals on the farm.
      Returns:
      animals An ArrayList containing the farm's animals.

    • getCrops

      public java.util.ArrayList<Crop> getCrops()
      Gets the current crops growing on the farm.
      Returns:
      crops An ArrayList containing the farm's crops.

    • getItems

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getItems()
      Gets the current items owned by the player.
      Returns:
      items An ArrayList containing the farm's items.

    • getAnimalLimit

      public int getAnimalLimit()
      Gets the farm's current limit of animals.
      Returns:
      animalLimit The maximum number of animals allowed on the farm.

    • getCropLimit

      public int getCropLimit()
      Gets the farm's current limit of crops.
      Returns:
      cropLimit The maximum number of crops allowed on the farm.

    • getHarvestableCrops

      public java.util.ArrayList<Crop> getHarvestableCrops()
      Gets the crops on the player's farm that are currently ready for harvest.
      Returns:
      harvestableCrops An ArrayList containing all crops that can currently be harvested.

    • getAnimalItems

      public java.util.ArrayList<ItemForAnimal> getAnimalItems()
      Returns a list containing all of the items owned by the player that can be used on animals.
      Returns:
      animalItems An ArrayList that contains all items that could be used on an animal.

    • getCropItems

      public java.util.ArrayList<ItemForCrop> getCropItems()
      Returns a list containing all of the items owned by the player that could be used on crops.
      Returns:
      cropItems An ArrayList that contains all items that could be used on a crop.

    • changeMoney

      public void changeMoney​(double change)
      Manipulates the total current money of the farm. Throws an illegal argument exception if the money goes below 0.
      Parameters:
      change - The desired change in money.

    • addAnimal

      public void addAnimal​(Animal animal)
      Adds an animal into the ArrayList animals. If the farm's type allows it, adds a bonus to the animal's happiness and health.
      Parameters:
      animal - The animal to be added to the ArrayList.

    • addCrop

      public void addCrop​(Crop crop)
      Adds a crop into the ArrayList crops. If the farm's type allows it, decreases the crop's harvest time by a day.
      Parameters:
      crop - The crop to be added to the farm's current crops.

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(Item item)
      Adds an item into the ArrayList items.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be added to the farm's current items.

    • changeCropLimit

      public void changeCropLimit​(int incr)
      Changes the farms crop limit.
      Parameters:
      incr - Integer to change the crop limit by.

    • changeAnimalLimit

      public void changeAnimalLimit​(int incr)
      Changes the farms animal limit.
      Parameters:
      incr - Integer to change the animal limit by.

    • getBonusScore

      public int getBonusScore()
      Returns the farms current bonus score.
      Returns:
      currentbonusScore

    • incrBonus

      public void incrBonus​(int incr)
      Increases the farms current bonus score.
      Parameters:
      incr - Amount to increase the farm's bonus score by.
